I seldom write a review, but this Farm to Doorstep really give a great experience for me to buy vegetables and fruits online. Honestly, the vegetables and fruits are more fresh than I bought from supermarket. I feel great that I found this shop. Highly recommended. I will continue support, thanks.

Farm to Doorstep Koronadal was incredibly efficient with delivery and the products were incredible! I enjoyed fresh chicken breasts at a reasonable price and the vegetables were all large sizes and incredibly fresh. I will most definitely be using them again. Thank you.
